title: Agriculture form 3Routine livestock  rearing practices cont...     lesson 10

tasks.task: Performing livestock husbandry and management tasks.
subtasks: Administering dewormers to livestock using a drenching gun.
Applying chemicals for dipping to control external parasites.
Spraying pesticides with a hand sprayer.
Managing pastures through rotational grazing to disrupt parasite life cycles.
Docking or tail cutting of livestock to prevent fly infestation.
Trimming hooves using a hoof cutter to prevent diseases.
Providing dust baths with peat ash for parasite control.
Administering vaccines via injection, oral, nasal, or inhaled routes.
Differentiating types of vaccines (live attenuated, killed, toxoid) and their uses.
